link.description: Welcome to "Programming with C," a comprehensive video series designed to introduce you to the foundational concepts and techniques of the C programming language. As one of the most widely used languages in academia and industry, C serves as a cornerstone for understanding programming principles and building efficient software solutions. Whether you're a student learning C for the first time or a seasoned developer looking to enhance your skills, join us on this journey as we explore the essentials of C programming, step by step.
